title: Thomæ Hobbes Angli Malmesburiensis philosophi vita
author: Hobbes, Thomas, 1588-1679.
publisher: Apud Eleutherium Anglicum, fub Signo Veritatis,
notes: Imprint information from colophon reads: "Londini: Apud Guil. Crooke, ad Infigne Viridis Draconis juxta Portam vulgò dictam Temple Bar".
"To Mr. Hobbes" poem on [p. 5-8], signed Abraham Cowley.
"In Libellum Praestantissimi Tho. Hobbes, Viri verè Philosophi, de Naturâ Hominis" on p. [9-11], signed Rad. Bathurst, A.M. Col. Trin. Oxon. Soc. .
Reproduction of original in the Harvard University Library.
